title: Hamptons-Inspired Central Coast Waterfront Escape with Balcony Upgrade & Daily Breakfast
description:
Switch off and unwind at an ultra-stylish boutique stay on the laidback waterfront of New South Wales' Central Coast. Set in the charming town of Toukley, on the gorgeous coastline overlooking the glittering waters of Budgewoi Lake, this Hamptons-inspired sanctuary (known by locals as 'The Beachie') is the perfect high-end launchpad for discovering the wonders of the region, and an idyllic retreat after days filled with sun-kissed adventures - all just 90 minutes from Sydney.

This lakeside oasis offers state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service - from the expert chefs preparing signature dishes at the onsite restaurant to the iconic waterfront bar, an ideal setting for sipping cocktails. Enjoy your days floating in the blissful outdoor heated pool, out of town discovering the postcard-perfect nearby attractions or relaxing by the waterfront as the sun sets on the horizon.
offer_address: 200 Main Road, Toukley, New South Wales 2263, Australia

title: NSW Central Coast Five-Star Pullman Resort with Dining Credit & Daily Breakfast
description: Experience five-star Pullman luxury on New South Wales' Central Coast at the beachside Pullman Magenta Shores. Located between the pristine waters of the Pacific Ocean and Tuggerah Lake, this award-winning retreat is stamped with a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2020 badge and is set on 52 beautifully landscaped acres, boasting an 18-hole championship golf course, exclusively designed by Ross Watson. With its serene beachside setting and five-star facilities, Pullman Magenta Shores Resort is the perfect launchpad to explore the beautiful beaches, pristine national parks, wildlife sanctuaries, pretty waterways and thriving coastal towns of this enchanting part of New South Wales.
offer_address: 1 Magenta Drive, Magenta, New South Wales 2261, Australia

title: NSW Central Coast Waterfront Retreat Just 90 Minutes from Sydney with Breakfast Hamper
description: Pelican-filled bright blue skies, a high street brimming with scrumptious cafes and shimmering waters stretching as far as the eye can see - a getaway to the Central Coast is the perfect chance to discover everything that makes this corner of New South Wales so special. Situated just 90 minutes from Sydney in a picturesque seaside town, this hotel boasts a heated swimming pool, jacuzzi, fitness centre and dazzling views of Tuggerah Lake and the surrounding seascape. Ride one of the oldest carousels in the country, swim in the heritage-listed  Grant McBride Baths, cycle around the mighty lake or savour every scoop at the Great Australian Ice Creamery, all just minutes away on foot.
offer_address: 89 The Entrance Road, Central Coast, New South Wales 2261, Australia

title: Hamptons-Inspired Central Coast Waterfront Escape with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Switch off and unwind at an ultra-stylish boutique stay on the laidback waterfront of New South Wales' Central Coast. Escape from Sydney to a coastal haven just 90 minutes away, soaking up the sun at The Beachcomber Hotel & Resort.

Set in the charming town of Toukley, on the gorgeous coastline overlooking the glittering waters of Budgewoi Lake, this Hamptons-inspired sanctuary (known by locals as 'The Beachie') is the perfect high-end launchpad for discovering the wonders of the region and an idyllic retreat after days filled with sun-kissed adventures.

This lakeside oasis offers state-of-the-art amenities and outstanding service - from the expert chefs preparing signature dishes at the onsite restaurant to the iconic waterfront bar, an ideal setting for sipping cocktails.

offer_address: 200 Main Road, Toukley, New South Wales 2263, Australia

title: All-Inclusive, World-Class Luxury at the Winner of the Best Australian Boutique Lodge
description: Making Conde Nast Traveler’s 2018 Gold List and winner of the ‘Best Australian Boutique, Hotel, Villa or Lodge’, according to Luxury Travel Magazine’s 2018 Gold List, we’d have to agree that the ultra-premium Pretty Beach House - nestled high in the treetops within New South Wales’ Bouddi National Park - is one of the best hotels in the world. Radiating romance in true seclusion (though only 90 minutes' drive from Sydney!), this all-inclusive, adults-only retreat overlooking the dreamy Pretty Beach is a true testament to luxury. Highly personalised menus are tailored to individual guests tastes, alongside a fully-stocked bar with premium wines and spirits. All this plus use of mountain bikes, two AU$50 spa credits and a welcome ceremony.
offer_address: 83 High View Rd, Pretty Beach NSW 2257

title: Modern Central Coast Escape near Tuggerah Lake with Daily Breakfast & Coffee Vocuher
description: Central Coast escapes don’t get much sweeter than this. Kick back and enjoy the region’s abundance of beaches, restaurants and bars with a stay at Encore by Mingara, conveniently located just a short drive from the tranquil shores of Tuggerah Lake and the spectacular Wyrrabalong National Park. Before your adventures, fuel up with an a la carte breakfast at The Roasted Berry; return to easygoing bites at Legends Taphouse or Australian-Chinese fare at Ming Dragon. You’ll also have access to the state-of-the-art fitness centre One by Mingara, including a heated indoor pool, athletic track and health classes.
offer_address: 12/14 Mingara Drive, Tumbi Umbi, New South Wales 2261, Australia

title: Central Coast Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Championship Golf Course & Daily Breakfast
description:
Relax and rejuvenate amid the tranquillity of this sprawling Central Coast haven, boasting an 18-hole golf course ranked among Australia’s top 100. Unwind in the sunshine with a glass of wine in hand as you take in the manicured grounds, enjoy a peaceful stroll around the lake or take on a friendly match of tennis on one of two onsite courts.

From sunrise to sunset, spend your days hopping between pristine beaches and soaking in the region's calm beauty. Refresh with a few laps in the outdoor or indoor pool, luxuriate at Wildfire Day Spa, explore the surrounding national parks, and spot dolphins and whales during the winter months. 

When it's time to indulge, treat yourself to alfresco dining at Karinyas Restaurant, served with panoramic views across the resort's rolling fairways. Surrender to the quiet luxury of this laid-back retreat and make it your gateway to the Central Coast's best.
offer_address: 40 Kooindah Boulevard, Wyong, New South Wales 2259, Australia

title: Central Coast Premium Apartment-Style Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Daily Breakfast & Dining Credit
description:
Experience beachside luxury on the New South Wales Central Coast at this peaceful retreat, located on the premium ribbon of land dividing the pristine Pacific Ocean from Tuggerah Lake. These stunning apartment-style studios and villas offer the perfect escape just 90 minutes north of Sydney.

The property is set on 52 beautifully landscaped acres and features an 18-hole championship golf course designed by the acclaimed Ross Watson. Take advantage of the serene seaside setting and hire one of the resort's e-bikes to explore beautiful beaches, pristine national parks, stunning waterways and thriving coastal towns.

When you're done practising your putt and exploring the surrounds, settle in for a delicious meal at the newly renovated Barretts Restaurant or a cocktail at Shallows Bar, take a dip in one of three swimming pools - a 20-metre indoor heated lap pool, rock pools and a sparkling lagoon pool - or indulge in a luxurious treatment at Vie Spa.
offer_address: 1 Magenta Drive, Magenta, New South Wales 2261, Australia

title: Award-Winning NSW Central Coast Stay with A$50 Dining Credit
description:
Experience award-winning luxury at Mercure Kooindah Waters Central Coast, just 90 minutes' drive north of Sydney. Ideally located on the beautiful New South Wales Central Coast, this award-winning retreat provides a peaceful escape and boasts an 18-hole championship golf course, recognised among the 'Top 100 Courses in Australia' by Australian Golf Digest.

Stay in a Standard King Room and enjoy A$50 food and drinks credit per room, a welcome bottle of wine and cheese platter on arrival and nightly in-room premium movie rental.

**Travelling with friends or family?** Upgrade to a Two Bedroom Apartment for four.

**Scenic Tour & Wildlife Upgrade available**: Make the most of your time on the Central Coast by selecting a two-night package with a scenic tour (small group, max. eight people) and a visit to the Australian Wildlife & Reptile Park with a VIP koala experience.

title: Hamptons-Inspired NSW Central Coast Retreat with Daily Breakfast & Daily Dining Credit
description:
Trace your way along the coast of New South Wales to reach the newly renovated, ultra-stylish The Quarters Forrester Beach, perfectly set between Wamberal and Bateau Bay. The ultimate laidback escape awaits, and the Hamptons-style glamour will help you ease into relaxation mode to enjoy sun-kissed days on the beach, world-class walking trails in Wyrrabalong National Park or the chance to spot whales at the Crackneck Lookout (season dependant).

At the end of each day, retreat to your stylish accommodation and enjoy newly renovated amenities. Perhaps your day might involve sampling flavoursome fare at The Pantry or the Gilded Anchor, or maybe it will be as effortless as lazing by the pool with a cocktail in hand. With space for the whole family or shared exclusively with someone special, your escape to Forresters Beach will be one you'll look back on with fond memories for years to come.
offer_address: 960 Central Coast Hwy Forresters Beach New South Wales 2260 AU

title: Award-Winning All-Inclusive Luxury 90 Minutes from Sydney
description:
Deemed 'bucket list-worthy' by Vogue Australia and 'one of the best hotels in the world' by Condé Nast Traveler in its Gold List 2018, Pretty Beach House offers rural tranquillity a mere 90-minute drive from Sydney. Nestled high in the treetops within New South Wales’ Bouddi National Park, this world-class luxury lodge exudes understated sophistication with a backdrop of bay views and a soundtrack of chirping birds up high in the gum trees.

Highly personalised menus are tailored to individual guests' tastes, alongside a fully-stocked bar with premium wines and spirits. Enjoy all-inclusive dining and drinks plus two A$50 spa credits per stay, mountain bike hire, an Indigenous welcome ceremony and a 10% discount on excursions.
offer_address: 83 High View Rd, Pretty Beach NSW 2257

title: All-Inclusive, World-Class Luxury at the Winner of the Best Australian Boutique Lodge
description: Making Conde Nast Traveler’s 2018 Gold List and winner of the ‘Best Australian Boutique, Hotel, Villa or Lodge’, according to Luxury Travel Magazine’s 2018 Gold List, we’d have to agree that the ultra-premium Pretty Beach House - nestled high in the treetops within New South Wales’ Bouddi National Park - is one of the best hotels in the world. Radiating romance in true seclusion (though only 90 minutes from Sydney or less via seaplane!), this all-inclusive, adults-only retreat overlooking the dreamy Pretty Beach is a true testament to luxury. Highly personalised menus are tailored to individual guests tastes, alongside a fully-stocked bar with premium wines and spirits. All this plus use of mountain bikes, two AU$50 spa credits and a welcome Indigenous smoking ceremony.
offer_address: 83 High View Rd, Pretty Beach NSW 2257

title: NSW Central Coast Mercure Escape 90 Minutes from Sydney with Championship Golf Course & Daily Breakfast
description:
Relax and rejuvenate at Mercure Kooindah Waters Central Coast, just a 90-minute drive north of Sydney. Ideally located on the beautiful New South Wales Central Coast, this retreat provides a peaceful escape and boasts an 18-hole championship golf course, recognised among the top 100 golf courses in Australia. Sit back in the blissful sunshine with a glass of wine in hand while enjoying the manicured grounds, take a stroll around the tranquil lake in the heart of the property and enjoy the friendly competition on the tennis court. From the moment the sun rises to the second it sets, spend your days hopping from one pristine beach to another and bask in the calmness of the region.

Feel refreshed with a few laps in the outdoor or indoor pool, explore the beauty of the surrounding wetlands and national parks or spot passing dolphins and whales in the winter months. Treat yourself to unbelievably delicious and modern dining at Karinyas Restaurant, showcasing the highest quality local produce, paired with the perfect glass of wine. No matter where you are on the property, the views will take your breath away. Succumb to the quiet luxury of this laidback resort and make the most of your launchpad to the beautiful Central Coast.
offer_address: 40 Kooindah Boulevard, Wyong, New South Wales 2259, Australia

title: Hamptons-Style Central Coast Getaway with Waterfront Bar & Pool
description: Escape from Sydney to a coastal haven just 90 minutes away, soaking up sun at The Beachcomber Hotel & Resort. Slip into holiday mode at this bright and vibrant waterfront locale that rivals a Hamptons holiday home. Take in sparkling views of Budgewoi Lake from the Club Cyan bar or one of the many cabanas surrounding the heated deckside pool, and indulge your way all day at The Beachie Pub, Bar & Grill which features a menu of elevated pub classics.
